snippet.title: Dark and Deep - Official Consoles Announce Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: A conspiracy podcast drags you into a hauntingly illustrated world of mystery and terror. Reveal secrets and horrors with mystical frames given to you by a strange observer. Step into the unsettling world of Dark and Deep in this new trailer for the first person cosmic horror game with a focus on puzzles and exploration. Dark and Deep is out now on Steam, and coming soon to consoles.
